meanings.definition: In an anxious or fearful manner
meanings.sent1: She looked apprehensively at the dark alley ahead.
meanings.sent2: He walked apprehensively into the haunted house.
meanings.sent3: The cat eyed the vacuum cleaner apprehensively, unsure if it was a friend or foe.
meanings.sent4: The student approached the challenging exam apprehensively, like facing a dragon.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds gathered apprehensively, signaling an impending downpour.
